item.title: Getting systems to simulate flight behavior in Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 | Sebastian Wloch interview
item.description: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, the ambitious flight sim game out today, the physics and environmental systems are very sophisticated.

item.title: Genies launches Parties for brands and creators to launch their own ‘AI Roblox’
item.description: Genies, an avatar technology company, has launched Parties after developing its foundational technology stack since the last fundraise.

item.title: Microsoft’s new AI agents support 1,800 models (and counting)
item.description: New Copilot capabilities allow users to build customized autonomous AI agents, pull from out-of-the-box options and deploy without coding.
